Events:
Plays the "Hey!" animation from Bopeebo,
Value 1: BF = Only Boyfriend, GF = Only Girlfriend,
Something else = Both.
Value 2: Custom animation duration,
leave it blank for 0.6s

Sets GF head bopping speed,
Value 1: 1 = Normal speed,
2 = 1/2 speed, 4 = 1/4 speed etc.
Used on Fresh during the beatbox parts.

Warning: Value must be integer!

Value 1: 0 = Turn off, 1 = Blue, 2 = Green,
3 = Pink, 4 = Red, 5 = Orange, Anything else = Random.
For Mom's songs, don't use this please, i love them :(

Used on MILF on that one "hard" part
Value 1: Camera zoom add (Default: 0.015)
Value 2: UI zoom add (Default: 0.03)
Leave the values blank if you want to use Default.
Should be used only in "school" Stage!
Should be used only in "schoolEvil" Stage!

Plays an animation on a Character,
once the animation is completed,
the animation changes to Idle

Value 1: Animation to play.
Value 2: Character (Dad, BF, GF)

Value 1: X
Value 2: Y

The camera won't change the follow point
after using this, for getting it back
to normal, leave both values blank.

Sets a speciied suffix after the idle animation name.
You can use this to trigger 'idle-alt' if you set
Value 2 to -alt

Value 1: Character to set (Dad, BF or GF)
Value 2: New suffix (Leave it blank to disable)

Value 1: Camera shake
Value 2: HUD shake

Every value works as the following example: "1, 0.05".
The first number (1) is the duration.
The second number (0.05) is the intensity.

Value 1: Character to change (Dad, BF, GF)
Value 2: New character's name

Value 1: The y value the bars will be added to
(put 1 for default)
 
Value 2: Time

Value 1: Zoom Value
Value 2: Time (none for instant)

Value 1: Text
Value 2: Char (dad for dad, mom for mom and so on)
Put 'remove' in value 1 to remove the thing lol
Put '<>' to split the text and
to add a color
(Example: Penis<>FF0000)

Value 1: If it should tween. (true/false)
Value 2: Time for tween (tween must be on.)
Spins notes on a certain beat

Fatal Error reference?!
value 1: Amount (leave blank for only one)

D Sides Too Slow?!
value 1: New length in milliseconds

Hides SOME hud elements
Value 1: Alpha,
Value 2: Time in secs (0 for instant)

Multiplys the camera zoom by Value 1
MUST BE GREATER THAN 0

Value 1: Angle
Value 2: Secs
You can put '<>' to split the time
AND to add an EASE

Based off that funny part in blammed
Value 1: Player (DAD, BF)
Value 2: Angle (CANNOT BE A NEGATIVE)

Value 1: Type anything here to play the sound effect
Value 2: Duration of the shake
Value 1: Skin to change to (file path)

Value 1: Tween Time
Value 2: How long it should be up (tween time included)
Place to toggle the static used in 'Triple Trouble'
